languages.text: Каторжане могут приносить намного больше пользы, если путем небольшой аугментации лишить их способности спать.
The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.
languages.original_text: Каторжане могут приносить намного больше пользы, если путем небольшой аугментации лишить их способности спать.

traits.locale_text: The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.
The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.
The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.
The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.
The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.

languages.text: Les condamnés seront bien plus utiles si on les empêche de dormir grâce à une petite augmentation.
languages.original_text: The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.

traits.locale_text: Les condamnés seront bien plus utiles si on les empêche de dormir grâce à une petite augmentation.

languages.text: 小さな増強装置を使用して囚人の眠りを妨げれば、彼らをさらに役立たせることができるだろう。
languages.original_text: The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.

traits.locale_text: 小さな増強装置を使用して囚人の眠りを妨げれば、彼らをさらに役立たせることができるだろう。

languages.text: 如果能通过某种小小的植入物剥夺犯人的睡眠，他们就能发挥更大的作用。
languages.original_text: The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.

traits.locale_text: 如果能通过某种小小的植入物剥夺犯人的睡眠，他们就能发挥更大的作用。

languages.text: Los convictos serán mucho más útiles si se les impide dormir empleando un pequeño aumento.
languages.original_text: The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.

traits.locale_text: Los convictos serán mucho más útiles si se les impide dormir empleando un pequeño aumento.

languages.text: Die Sträflinge werden sehr viel nützlicher sein, wenn sie durch eine kleine Augmentation am Schlafen gehindert werden.
languages.original_text: The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.

traits.locale_text: Die Sträflinge werden sehr viel nützlicher sein, wenn sie durch eine kleine Augmentation am Schlafen gehindert werden.

languages.text: Ufak bir ogmentasyonla uyumaları engellenebilirse mahkûmlar çok daha işlevli olacaktır.
languages.original_text: The convicts will be of much greater use if they are kept from sleeping by employing a small augmentation.
